attributes.action: Allow former Gurkha soldier Tul Bahadur Pun VC entry into the UK for medical treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tul Bahadur Pun VC has been refused entry  because he "Failed to demonstrate strong ties with the UK" Clearly this decision is not only wrong but shows a complete lack of consideration of what this man has done on behalf of us all in the past. Let him in now and give him the medical treatment he deserves then allow him to remain in the United Kindom.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/gurkhas-rights/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
